title: Catch-all
description: DescriptionAbout usPerfect Storm Studios was founded by game industry veterans to build the next generation of games around web3 technologies. We believe the best web3 games will be those that seamlessly integrate the amazing game design, community involvement and fair play-to-earn systems. We have an A+ culture that is a perfect balance of both fun interactions and fulfilling work. Currently working on a to-be-announced MOBA project.The RoleIn the event that you have a skill-set that we are not currently actively hiring for, and you have the ability, drive, and a passion for MOBAs, then we encourage you to please apply here and add a detailed cover letter explaining why you want to join as well as what skills/job function you believe you could do for consideration. We are always looking for passionate and driven individuals to join our team.ResponsibilitiesUndefinedRequirementsUndefinedBenefitsWork From HomeStock Option Plan
